description: SEO competitor comparison blog posts for organic search traffic

userStories.title: Write Baisics vs Fitbod comparison post
userStories.description: Create SEO-optimized comparison blog post targeting 'fitbod alternative' and 'baisics vs fitbod' keywords.
acceptanceCriteria: Copy template to src/content/blog/baisics-vs-fitbod/index.tsx
Research Fitbod: pricing ($12.99/mo), AI workout generation, exercise library, platforms
Write honest comparison: where Fitbod wins (polished app, Apple Watch), where Baisics wins (free tier, meal prep, coach mode)
Include comparison table with pricing, features, platforms
Set published: true and correct date
Verify page renders at /blog/baisics-vs-fitbod
npm run typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Fitbod is our closest direct competitor - AI-generated workouts
